ygData.subject: RE: [eqenchanters] Level 20 HELP!
ygData.msgSnippet: I have heard this happen where a person puts only 1 point in what they want to be their prime specialization, it goes up then stops completely until they put
ygData.messageBody:
I have heard this happen where a person puts only 1 point in what they want to be their prime specialization, it goes up then stops completely until they put points in their remaining specialize skills. I didn't have a problem with just putting 1 point into specialize alteration, when it hit 51 I went back and trained all the others.

Zealott
